comments.author: Stephane Lo Presti.7258
comments.body:
Hey AdelphiA.9287,

We’ll publish soon a sticky in this subforum to better explain the rules, but here’s basically the answer to your question in two parts:

  • You can have a thread in the API Development subforum but it has to be a technical discussion between API application developers exclusively (and posts from non-developers should be reported so that we can enforce this rule so that we can keep this subforum focused on API Development)
  • You can create a thread in the Fan-generated Content subforum to have a more general discussion and feedback gathering (including bug reports) with the users of your API application; the forum’s Code of conduct and specific subforum guidelines apply

Let us know if you have questions or comments.
Thanks for supporting the GW2 API!
